widgets.css: line-height: 1.2;
widgets.label: Src : @{switch_srcDual1} @{script_dualName1}

widgets.onValue:
var src =  get(this)
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/xyz/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/gain/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/lfe/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/z/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/name/?')

widgets.css: line-height: 1.2;
widgets.label: Src : @{switch_srcDual2} @{script_dualName2}

widgets.onValue:
var src =  get(this)
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/xyz/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/gain/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/lfe/?')
send('/adm/obj/' + src + '/z/?')
send('/adm/obj/ ' + src + ' /name/?')
set("xy_Dual1", ["", value])
set("xy_Dual1", [value, ""])
set("xy_Dual2", [value, ""])
set("xy_Dual2", ["", value])
set("xy_Dual1", [value[0], value[1]])
set("xy_Dual2", [value[0], value[1]])
set('spat_srcDual1_z', value[2] )
set('spat_srcDual2_z', value[2] )

widgets.css: line-height: 1.2;
widgets.label: Src : @{switch_srcMulti8} @{script_multiName8}

widgets.css: line-height: 1.2;
widgets.label: Circle Reset
Next 8 Tracks
widgets.onValue:
set("variable_incValue", Math.min(Math.max(get("variable_incValue")+8, 0),56))

var ic = get('variable_incValue')
var ic1 = ic+1
var ic8 = ic+8

 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/gain/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/name/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/mute/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/solo/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/invph/?')

widgets.label: Previous 8 Tracks
widgets.onValue:
set("variable_incValue", Math.max(get("variable_incValue")-8, 0))

var ic = get('variable_incValue')
var ic1 = ic+1
var ic8 = ic+8

 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/gain/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/name/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/lfe/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/mute/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/solo/?')
 send('/adm/obj/'+ic1+'-'+ic8+'/invph/?')

widgets.label: Clear Solo
widgets.onValue: send('/adm/obj/1-64/solo', 0)

widgets.onValue: set("variable_snapshotnum", get('switch_snapshot'))

widgets.label: Recall N@{switch_snapshot}
widgets.onValue:
var sn = get('switch_snapshot')
send('/snapshot/'+sn+'/recall/')

widgets.default: Type your snapshot's name here then press return

widgets.label: ^arrow-left Previous
widgets.onValue: set("variable_snapshotnum", Math.max(get("variable_snapshotnum")-1, 1))

widgets.label: Next ^arrow-right
widgets.onValue: set("variable_snapshotnum", Math.max(get("variable_snapshotnum")+1))

widgets.label: ^arrow-left Previous
widgets.onValue:
set("variable_snapshotnum", Math.max(get("variable_snapshotnum")-1, 1))
send('/snapshot/previous/recall')

widgets.label: Next ^arrow-right
widgets.onValue:
set("variable_snapshotnum", Math.max(get("variable_snapshotnum")+1))
send('/snapshot/next/recall')

    <text

       id="text25766"><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         id="tspan25764"
         style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:16.9333px;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Bold';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583;stroke-opacity:1"
         x="97.097954"
         y="23.915827">Open Stage Control Server Setup</tspan></text>
    <text
       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;font-size:10.5833px;line-height:1.25;font-family:sans-serif;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583;stroke-opacity:1"
       x="175.41331"

       id="text28350"><tspan

         id="tspan28348"
         style="fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583;stroke-opacity:1"
         x="175.41331"
         y="50.374161">Send : choose an output port</tspan></text>

       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;font-size:10.5833px;line-height:1.25;font-family:sans-serif;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583;stroke-opacity:1"
       x="167.96935"
       y="76.832497"
       id="text32218"><tspan

         id="tspan32216"
         style="fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583;stroke-opacity:1"
         x="167.96935"
         y="76.832497">OSC-port : choose an input port</tspan></text>
    <text
       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;font-size:10.5833px;line-height:1.25;font-family:sans-serif;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583"
       x="91.095734"
       y="219.70749"
       id="text6150"><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         id="tspan6148"
         style="fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.264583"
         x="91.095734"
         y="219.70749">To enable the multiplayer, (<tspan
   style="font-style:italic;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:10.5833px;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Italic';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1"
   id="tspan47352">one server multiple controller)</tspan>, </tspan><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         style="fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.264583"
         x="91.095734"
         y="232.93661"
         id="tspan23066">please fill the address like this : 'http://server-ip:port?id=x' </tspan><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         style="fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.264583"
         x="91.095734"
         y="246.16574"
         id="tspan80904">eg : 'http://192.168.1.70:9000?id=4'</tspan></text>
    <text
       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:16.9333px;line-height:1.25;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Bold';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583"
       x="100.86856"
       y="153.56166"
       id="text37978"><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         id="tspan37976"
         style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:16.9333px;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Bold';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.264583"
         x="100.86856"
         y="153.56166">Open Stage Control Client Setup</tspan></text>
    <text
       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:10.5833px;line-height:1.25;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.264583"
       x="119.06552"
       y="182.66583"

         x="119.06552"
         y="182.66583">in your browser use the ip adress  & port provided </tspan><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:10.5833px;font-family:sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'sans-serif, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#ffffff;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:0.264583"

         y="195.89496"
